attributes.action: Allow Donald Trump to carry out his state visit
attributes.additional_details: See Newspaper headlines ' Muslims Banned' and similar headlines on BBC website
attributes.background:
Mis-information by the Media has created an anti Trump campaign to carry out a state visit to the UK.
The media have fueled racial hatred
Mr Trump signed an order prohibiting Migrants from named countries from entering the USA for security reasons
He has not banned Muslims
